> Message: 3         
>    Date: Tue, 12 Oct 2004 14:47:05 -0500
>    From: "Chappell, Simon P" <simon.chappell@...>
> Subject: Definitions question
> 
> We're having some "robust" discussions about testing here and one of the
> big issues concerns correct nomenclature for testing types and levels and
> scopes. Does anyone have any book recommendations to help with industry
> accepted terms and definitions? 

Get Boris Beizer's "Black Box Testing" (Myers is too old). "Black Box
Testing" has lots of pages with nomenclature, and B.Beizer counts as one of
the (or maybe even the) guru in the area of testing (overall), so what he
says is definitely "industry standard". Whether you then (as a group or as
individuals) decide to follow his definitions, is of course your
(meta-)decision ...

Regards
Harald M. Mueller
